column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is so much fun and the staff is really helpful on suggestions and super nice. The vibe is cool and the food is to die for. HOWEVER
column2: it is super expensive and my one friend and I spent about a hundred dollars or so easily in one sitting. So only go if you're ready to lay down your wallet. I go rarely because of the prices but honestly from the way the food tastes I am not surprised by how much it costs. The food is honestly so good that I once had a dream about it.... seriously.
